mapper.select: SELECT if(count(*) = 1 ,1 , 0) FROM schedule WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND schedule_time = '0900'

SELECT b.* FROM ( SELECT schedule_time, CASE dayofweek(#{date}) WHEN '1' THEN sun WHEN '2' THEN mon WHEN '3' THEN tue WHEN '4' THEN wed WHEN '5' THEN thu WHEN '6' THEN fri WHEN '7' THEN sat END AS possible FROM pawmap.schedule WHERE com_num = #{comNum} ) b WHERE b.possible is not null;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation(reservation_seq, com_num, user_id, schedule_time, reservation_date, regDate) VALUES ((SELECT IFNULL(MAX(reservation_seq),0 )+ 1 FROM reservation a WHERE com_num = #{comNum}), #{comNum}, #{userId}, #{scheduleTime}, #{reservationDate}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT r.* ,u.user_nickname FROM reservation AS r INNER JOIN user AS u ON r.com_num = u.com_num WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} order by r.reservation_date , r.schedule_time
SELECT s.user_id ,u.user_nickname from schedule AS s INNER JOIN user AS u ON s.user_id = u.user_id where s.com_num = #{comNum} limit 1
SELECT r.*, u.user_nickname FROM reservation AS r INNER JOIN user AS u ON r.user_id = u.user_id where r.com_num = #{comNum} AND r.reservation_date = #{date} order by r.reservation_date, schedule_time
